title: Funding opportunity: Pre-announcement: Biological influence on ocean carbon: novel modelling approaches
organization: Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council
description: Apply for funding for a UK-US project to develop new representations of key processes regulating ocean carbon storage for use in global models. For project lead and other UK researchers, you must be: National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) will be providing support. US researchers must be affiliated with a US institution at the time of application submission.
